alert.note: Alert for Pontotoc (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 06 at 8:01PM CDT until September 06 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM CDT FOR CHICKASAW...CALHOUN...SOUTHERN PONTOTOC AND SOUTHWESTERN MONROE COUNTIES... At 800 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles east of Houlka to near Houston to Derma, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Pontotoc, Aberdeen, Houston, Okolona, Bruce, Calhoun City, Vardaman, Derma, Pittsboro, Slate Springs, Prairie, Pyland, Randolph, Trebloc, Houlka, New Houlka, Algoma, Big Creek, Woodland and Robbs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
